verses: In her gaze, the fate that time controls
etching through night, a slender line unfolds.
Without notice, a simple city-bred country soul,
from distant waves, across the ocean whole.
Sweet nymph, that I admire with glee,
foreign tongue, so fluent in me.
At your presence, you carry the world in your chest,
like ancient wisdom in a glow manifest.
Damp earth below, **mushrooms** softly grown,
roots interlacing, in the essence we're known.
This tangle of passion would make **Sappho** turn green,
in the lyre of desire, pure prose and a dream.
And instead of seeing you only on weekend tours,
you appeared, suddenly, in every simple flowerbed’s pores.
From the green fields to the light of the **new moon’s** glow,
to silly little puns that make your own comedy show.
It was here, without thinking, that my heart found its cue,
and suddenly all love songs talked about you.
Because I am greedy for the sight of you,
for your touch and all feelings due.
The taste of your smile lingers on me like a dare,
in between our kisses, engraved in the air.
In your body, I found a familiar house, for me so new
from all this pleasure of loving you
For I want to share with you what life can give,
flowers and dreams in which we live.
A storm of sensations, so full of emotion,
in this grand confession of all my devotion.
Endless **rain** that never says goodbye,
this love that doesn’t dare to **Kai**.
